docs.lead_paragraph: President Donald Trump has declared that the media are the "enemy of the people," but his administration is willing to joke around with reporters — and poke fun at itself — in a venerable Washington tradition.

headline.print_headline: Pence Jokes With 'Enemy of the People' at Gridiron Dinner
headline.main: Pence Jokes With 'Enemy of the People' at Gridiron Dinner

docs.snippet: President Donald Trump has declared that the media are the "enemy of the people," but his administration is willing to joke around with reporters — and poke fun at itself — in a venerable Washington tradition....

docs.lead_paragraph: With Frank Kaminsky out, the Charlotte Hornets needed someone to step up at the end of a long road trip.

docs.lead_paragraph: Quiet on the scoresheet the entire second half, Sydney Wiese finally found a bit of space as the final minutes ticked away.

docs.lead_paragraph: A Sikh man was shot and wounded in Washington state by an attacker who approached him in his driveway and told him to leave the country, police and media reported on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Sikh, Told to Leave Country, Shot in Washington State: Police
headline.main: Sikh, Told to Leave Country, Shot in Washington State: Police

docs.snippet: A Sikh man was shot and wounded in Washington state by an attacker who approached him in his driveway and told him to leave the country, police and media reported on Saturday....

docs.lead_paragraph: Sofia Goggia edged Lindsey Vonn into second place at a World Cup event for the second time in two days, winning the Super-G at the 2018 Olympic course on Sunday to follow her victory in the downhill.

headline.print_headline: Goggia Edges Vonn for Second Day on 2018 Olympic Course
headline.main: Goggia Edges Vonn for Second Day on 2018 Olympic Course

docs.snippet: Sofia Goggia edged Lindsey Vonn into second place at a World Cup event for the second time in two days, winning the Super-G at the 2018 Olympic course on Sunday to follow her victory in the downhill....

docs.lead_paragraph: A rhythm shooter on a team out of sync, Jamal Crawford and the Los Angeles Clippers broke out on Saturday night.

docs.lead_paragraph: A father had worked for the U.S. government in Afghanistan, court documents show, and a restraining order was needed to keep his wife and children from a detention center.

docs.lead_paragraph: Romell Quioto had a goal in his Major League Soccer debut and the Houston Dynamo scored two first-half goals to beat the defending MLS Cup champion Seattle Sounders 2-1 in a league opener Saturday night.

headline.main: Dynamo Beat Defending MLS Cup Champion Sounders 2-1
